content.action: Alex gets a call from Mr. Harrison.

content.dialogue: Alex, I know it's still summer break, but I need a huge favor. I left some important documents in three different spots around town.
Could you possibly pick them up for me before school starts tomorrow? I'll give you extra credit!

content.action: Alex agrees. A list appears on the screen showing three locations. The player can choose the order.
[SCENE START] AFTERNOON - THE QUIET MUG CAFE - INTERIOR

content.dialogue: Hi, I'm here to pick something up for Mr. Harrison?
Oh, Mr. H! Yes, he left this folder.

content.action: She hands over a folder labeled 'Poetry Analysis'. [ITEM GET: Poetry Analysis]
[SCENE START] AFTERNOON - OLD TOWN LIBRARY - STUDY AREA
The library is silent. Alex finds the designated study carrel. A heavy textbook is on the desk with a folder sticking out.
The label reads 'Historical Timelines'. [ITEM GET: Historical Timelines]
[SCENE START] LATE AFTERNOON - SUNBEAM PARK - BY THE FOUNTAIN
Alex finds the bench. Tucked underneath is a small, waterproof document bag with a USB drive inside. [ITEM GET: Research USB]
This scene triggers after the player has collected all three items.
Alex enters the empty classroom and leaves the items on Mr. Harrison's desk. The quest is complete.
